name: Avoid unreferenced views
description: List of schema views that are not called
output:
this report lists all unreferenced views .
It provides the following information:

- View name
- View fullname
rationale:
Unreferenced views may be the symptom of Dead Code. And dead Code must be avoided as it makes source code less readable and increases the cost of the software maintenance. A view is flagged as unreferenced when it is not called.

Warning:
Unreference code can also be the symptoms of missing code (code not included in the source code analysis) and / or can be the symptom of use of polymorphism.
remediation:
inspect code, check it is truly unnecessary.
Remove views  that are not used.
total: total is number of views stored in the schema

qualityStandards.name: Dead code
qualityStandards.description: Number of instances where a function or method is unreferenced by any other code item in the application (the application determines the scope of the search for code items that could call a function or method element)
